description: Meet 21 year old Cole Hardy, Oklahoma native who's now living out west in Utah, of all places. Cole stands 5'8' tall, weighs about 145 lbs, has hazel eyes and a nice tempting 7' cock! He's an excellent bottom (really takes a pounding) and he's got that adorable college fratboy look going for him. A true hottie and today he rubs out a load just for us!
title: Citiboyz 58: 'The Sexual Rematch', Scene #05
